tweet: b"My friend, comedian @markschiff, has written a very funny book called \xe2\x80\x98Why Not? Lessons on Comedy, Courage and Chutzpah.\xe2\x80\x99 It's the closest thing you can get to hearing Mark tell hilarious stories, which is one of my favorite things to do. https://t.co/O9qwBLot8y"
b'A web experiment that became a television show, and now it\xe2\x80\x99s in print. The Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee Book is now available. https://t.co/YvPCVSxHan https://t.co/wnD84Xg9i7'

b'Ten years later, we have produced 84 episodes and we\xe2\x80\x99re on Netflix. It\xe2\x80\x99s a crazy story, and this book seems like a good way to tell it, along with some of my favorite photos and dialogue. The Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee Book is out November 22. https://t.co/YvPCVSPiyX https://t.co/ceKfAPfdWt'

b'The first episode of Comedians in Cars Getting Coffee went online ten years ago -- on our own website, without any press or promotion. Just me and Larry David having a funny conversation. We called it a web series because nobody knew what streaming television was. (1/2)'
